channel.title: Downsizing client, how would I remove maps?
channel.description: I'm downsizing a client, the first thing I want to do is get rid of all the maps but one area, how would I do this?

item.title: Downsizing client, how would I remove maps?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Just look to what i was saying on rune server, itll be the easiest and quickest way to do it.

Although ill tell you this, removing most of the maps wont downsize your client by much, alot of the size comes from models. You may also want to remove all the songs from the cache as you wont be using those, correct? If so they are in idx3

Read full topic
item.source: Downsizing client, how would I remove maps?

item.title: Downsizing client, how would I remove maps?

item.description:

Depends the size of the region you wish to keep.
